episodes.title: July 2024 ICSA Presentation - Chris Lee
episodes.description:
The theme of the 2024 ICSA Conference is "Evidence-based Recovery."

My presentation's tentative Title is: "Developing a Grassroots resistance-, education-, and support- movement."

In about 40 minutes, I'm trying (very briefly) to cover my story, REVEAL.org, some plans for recovery.

Slides are currently here: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1ID5SyqModi1L7-NN9jp16sjqEM5KhulzOyeV-HLxXhE/edit?usp=sharing

Some materials I used/referenced:
Stanford's Awareness Flyer: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KzM_JFY4Shdu--oEv0EeZXE9Jih0Bu8L/view?usp=sharing
Northeastern's Spiritual Life Flyer: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1uDYX-I9zy2mkh0PAkQPc56DaNMg9WwO1/view?usp=sharing

A one-page, double-sided summary of the ICC and ICOC: http://www.reveal.org/tracts/tract1.pdf

ICOC and ICC Lawsuits here: https://icoc-icclawsuits.com/

Shout out to all the other people who are working on "Shedding Light and Showing Truth on the ICOC and ICC" such as 
https://www.youtube.com/@nikietalambert
https://www.youtube.com/@emmettkellogg7565 
https://www.youtube.com/@sparrowministry9454 
https://www.youtube.com/@losingmyreligion654 
https://www.youtube.com/@icocshenanigans 
https://www.youtube.com/@whatheflokcultsurvivalstor6528
https://www.youtube.com/@ICOCinvestigation
https://www.youtube.com/@rohnfamilyadventure
Aldo B. Martin's Reclamation Podcast
Austin Noll's Crumpled Papers Podcast
Clemenz with a "Z" Podcast
Many other websites like tolc.org, exploringicc.org!

episodes.title: History of Crossroads, the International Churches of Christ, and International Christian Churches
episodes.description:
REVEAL.org reviews the history of Crossroads, Boston Movement, International Churches of Christ, International Christian Churches (draft).

I plan to re-record this and pare down a bit so it's under an hour.

You can view the slide deck here on Google Slides: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1qZ5SGe2ZhyRg3jJHXh9YyCjry_LweWmD5py01LMKroU/edit?usp=sharing

episodes.title: REVEAL.org AskMeAnything 1/27/2024
episodes.description:
This was the Ask Me Anything for REVEAL.org, covering news about the ICOC and ICC. Neither Michael nor I are affiliated with the ICOC nor the ICC -- we try to analyze the state of both.

REVEAL.org: http://www.reveal.org/

Some of the links we mentioned:

ICOC Official Websites:
https://disciplestoday.org/
https://icocco-op.org/
https://icocco-op.org/church-list/

Lawsuits:
https://icoc-icclawsuits.com/

A critical site analyzing the International Christian Churches:
https://exploringicc.org/

Free2B:
https://www.instagram.com/free2b_org/p/CrY23Dovhks/

Last Principles: https://www.youtube.com/@UC_j6-5fim78s_XL4WQLXWFA 
Asha Glenn and Nikieta Lambert: https://www.youtube.com/@UCvyOve11JdrB4gMNLBnVg2A 
Crumpled Papers Podcast:
https://crumpledpaperspodcast.podbean.com/
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-crumpled-papers-podcast/id1659958851

When an MLM meets a Church by https://www.youtube.com/@UCpDmn2FfVYdPIDwRTcf5-OA :
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RtovBivkDdo

Warnings: 
The lawsuits involving adult topics are discussed.
